entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The famous wizard and main character of the story.

entities.name: hestia
entities.description: A person who is concerned about Harry's safety and position in the anti-Voldemort movement.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as a reference to the danger Harry faces.

relationships.description: Hestia is concerned about Harry's safety and position in the anti-Voldemort movement, as she believes he holds a unique position in the hearts of those who oppose Voldemort.
